title: Ibiza NXT 2023 – Heading toward a purpose-driven Web3 innovation journey
description: Ibiza NXT returns with its third edition, taking place from October 4th to 6th on Ibiza, the globally renowned ‘White Island’. This iconic destination has embarked on a transformative journey to evolve into a ‘blockchain island’ committed to enhancing connectivity, scalability, and sustainability within its vibrant community. This year’s conference dives deep into the convergence ... Read more

title: Blockchain developers are the real winners in the crypto space
description: 2022 may not have been a great year for the crypto industry, with scandals and bankruptcies becoming order-of-the-day issues and the likes of Bitcoin and Ethereum suffering the consequences of a new market downturn. But it was quite the opposite for blockchain and the developers that work hard to create, maintain and advance this innovative ... Read more
